Maths Stuff
Navigation:Jordi Kling/Maths Stuff/

I may work as a software developer, but in my heart of hearts I will always be a mathematician.

Well, except for the part where you have to do research...

I do have a published paper though: On the Dirac Spectrum of Homogeneous 3-Spheres (This is joint work with my dear professor Dorothee Sch√ºth.)

The Present

This is mostly about teaching.

  • Algebraische Strukturen

    In the 2024/2025 school year, I will once again be leading the working group Algebraische Strukturen (Algebraic Structures) at Heinrich-Hertz-Gymnasium.

  • Maths Lessons

    I offer maths lessons in my free time. (This page is the destination of a physical flyer. It is referenced here for completeness only.)

The Past
  • Humboldt University Berlin

    I finished my studies at Humboldt University in October 2021 with a master's degree in mathematics, focused on differential geometry.
